error.message: Violation of PRIMARY KEY constraint 'PK_dbo.ProductTags'. Cannot insert duplicate key in object 'dbo.ProductTags'. The duplicate key value is (0591907b-82de-e711-9bad-28d2448d1763, efdcfc82-b6dc-e711-9bad-28d2448d1763). The statement has been terminated.
error.detail: System.Data.Entity.Infrastructure.DbUpdateException: An error occurred while saving entities that do not expose foreign key properties for their relationships.
